blog.name: 0189_rotate_array.md
blog.content:
# Rotate Array

## Description

[doc](https://leetcode.com/study-plan/algorithm/?progress=d3ejkfm)

## Solutions

### First Idea

```javascript
/**
 * @param {number[]} nums
 * @param {number} k
 * @return {void} Do not return anything, modify nums in-place instead.
 */
var rotate = function (nums, k) {
  const rotate = k % nums.length

  const deleted = nums.splice(0, nums.length - rotate)
  nums.push(...deleted)
}
```

pageProps.html:
Rotate Array

Description

doc

Solutions

First Idea

/**
 * @param {number[]} nums
 * @param {number} k
 * @return {void} Do not return anything, modify nums in-place instead.
 */
var rotate = function (nums, k) {
  const rotate = k % nums.length

  const deleted = nums.splice(0, nums.length - rotate)
  nums.push(...deleted)
}
